title: Google photos not syncing
content:
Checking under settings-backup it shows 20 photos that is suppose to backup. After a day, it still says 20 photos. 

When I check in Google Photos, only the camera folder is the one checked. Thus I switch sync off and waited for about an hour before switching it back on. I then leave it for about an hour. After an hour and under settings-backup it still shows 20 photos. 

Tried under mobile and wifi, situation remains the same. I have tried clearing Google photos app cache, I have even tried deleting app data, force stop and it still remains at 20. 

I move those 20 photos on to a different folder leaving the camera roll empty. I then took one photo. Settings-backup now shows 1 photo to be backed up but even after a few hours, it does not backup unless I manually press the cloud symbol in Google Photos. 

What else can I try? I rather not perform a factory reset on the phone.
